name: Buff Coin
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
On-Chain Reward Ecosystem for everyone to enjoy

BUFF integrates advertisement, commerce, and promotion activities for rewards and provides such platform all over the world. Here comes the world for BUFF challenging to a greater fortune by purchasing, enjoying, and getting rewards. 

Various activities such as buying, paying, playing, and enjoying within the BUFF platform rises in value of consumers and stores, making a main role for each platform. The rewards that provide you greater joy as you spend, and share will activate the BUFF platform even more active.
